trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: コレクションを表します<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>内のオブジェクト、 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref>コントロール。

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, you access the GridColumnStylesCollection through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>、を通じて GridColumnStylesCollection にアクセスする、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A>プロパティ</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>。

trans-unit.source: The GridColumnStylesCollection uses standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> methods to manipulate the collection.
trans-unit.target: GridColumnStylesCollection は標準を使用して<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A>と<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A>コレクションを操作するメソッド</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific property value exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用して、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A>コレクション内で特定のプロパティ値が存在するかどうかを調べます</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the index of any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> object within the collection.
trans-unit.target: また、使用して、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>メソッドのいずれかのインデックスを確認する<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>コレクション内のオブジェクト</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the GridColumnStylesCollection before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle><xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>オブジェクト</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>を追加する前に GridColumnStylesCollection をに追加、オブジェクト</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>を常に作成。

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: 空の追加と<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>、有効な<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>、コレクションに値<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>オブジェクトが自動的に生成されます</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the GridColumnStylesCollection.
trans-unit.target: 新規追加しようとする場合に、例外がスローされますその結果、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>オブジェクトが複製によって<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>、GridColumnStylesCollection の値</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>。
